channel.description: Recent content in social-media on Stigatle.no

item.title: Yarn Desktop Client
item.description: I felt that I needed a new ‘home’ for social media when I shut down gnusocial \ diaspora instances I was running. I spent some time looking around. I have to admit I do not like the whole ‘web3’ stuff (nostr for example) and others, mostly because it attracts so many cryptobro’s, and I get tired of the constant shilling they do. I do not mind crypto - I use it a lot my self, but I do not need to be reminded about it on almost every post I see on social media.
